title: Once Bitten
description: Sal is turning 30 and she starts thinking about settling down with some one, even though she has had several sexual partners that have left her wanting. It has been her experience that a huge cock usually means a big ego, but that was not the case with Josh. Her thoughts begin to go back to that one date and night of passionate love making and then out of the blue he calls. They arrange for another date and it goes very well, until a very deep dark secret of his comes to light.
author: Jodie Sloan
